column4: i have a problem with playback of CDs on my iMac with the warty ubuntu, it has been mentioned on ubuntuforums.org and really noone came up with an answer as to why the CDROM will playback but give NO SOUND while all other media plays fine... i was wondering if any of you had a similar problem here, or maybe know of a way to fix... someone suggested to upgrade to hoary... is it worthwile?
did you look at your audio settings for the cdrom volume?
if you open the volume control you can set the volume of "CD", i dont know if thats what you are looking for but maybe it helps
